column5: Nice...  WTG Peter....
getting made means  something completely different here in New Jersey, Congarts
Well uh maybe I feel safer now when I come down for Salmon you better be quick if we need you .Congrats Pete I am sure you are proud.  MTP
Congratulations!!!I'm sure you will do a fine job!
Congrats to you!  Mike
right on congrats!
LOL, congrats Captain! More than one way to get a boat! They did give you one?
Good on you Peter! Congratulations.
Acting Captain Canadian Coast Gaurd Auxillary
Congrats dude!!!
Congrats
Congrats!
Congrats!  dk
Sir. Congrats!  Peace Ken
Fantastic Peter, you must be very proud  Congratulations.  Do you know how to sew those on now?  Joey
Very cool!  Congrats!
Well well.  Congrats Captain Pete!  HD
Congrats Peter, something to be very proud of.
Beam me up Captain!  Congrats
Congrats... That takes hard work... well done!  Cheers,  Jen
Thanks alll kind of a heavy weight but im good to go and proud to do my part  Peter
congrats
Way to go buddy!!!!!!!I guess this means you will be doing all the boat driving while I fish
You should be changed from 'almost a guide' to 'acting captain'.  Congratulations!
Congrats with your promotion!  Cheers, 1leg
I hope this promotion came with a significant wage increase! Congrats Pete -Brian
Way to go!
Congrats, thanks for using your time to keep others safe on the water..
congrats! that's soo cooL!
That's GREAT Peter, way to go     I know you'll do great, just hope it doesn't cut into your fishing  Maureen
SHEEEEE-YIIIIIIT!!! .......YOU??????   Just kiddin' Bubba!... Congratulations!!!  .. and here's to (tipping glass) Admiral!!!

That's one of the perks of being Captain. You get say when the rods go down and when the rods come up. Most distressed boaters don't mind if you respond at 2.8mph as long as they know your coming. ; -Brian
